column1: ERROR (E): Integer value is not divisible by 2
WARNING (W): Integer value is divisible by 2

Please check “WeiDU_TRA_Errors_and_Warnings.txt” for the reason why this table is created.
The integer value for @integer in the TRA file starts at 2147483647. 
32-bit integer range (-2147483648 .. 2147483647).
Negative values are forbidden.
